scripts.start: npm run build && cd dist && node server.js
scripts.build: if exist dist ( rd /s /q dist ) && mkdir dist && xcopy public dist\public\ /E /I /Y && xcopy landing_page dist\landing_page\ /E /I /Y && xcopy routes dist\routes\ /E /I /Y && copy server.js dist\ && copy package.json dist\ && copy package-lock.json dist\
